entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 11 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 11 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon except minus 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning.
